name: Davidmmelin.github.io
body:
##David Melin

### Software Developer
##### Specializing in Full-Stack Web Development
I recently graduated from [App Academy](www.appacademy.io), July 2013, and I am seeking employment at a tech company in the Los Angeles area. Feel free to contact me if you are hiring and we can chat. 

Email: davidmmelin@gmail.com
 
```

###Languages

 - Ruby
 - Rails
 - JavaScript: (jQuery, Backbone.js)
 - CSS
 - HTML
 - SQL 

```

### Popular Repos

####Job Blob [JobBlob.co](www.jobblob.co)

Job Blob is an interactive job application organizer. A great way to stay organized and keep all of your job application and contact information in one place. It was created as a tool for me and my fellow students to use during the job hunt after graduating from [App Academy](www.appacademy.io).

[Repo](github.com/DavidMMelin/jobber)

####Checkers

Checkers is written with ruby and played in the command line. Some colorize and symbols are used to make the game more pleasing to the eye. Clone and launch the 'checkers.rb' file in the command line to play!   

[Repo](github.com/DavidMMelin/checkers)

####Minesweeper

Minesweeper is written with ruby with recursive computer inteligence solution used to check the clicked cell's surroundings. This game is also played in the command line. Clone and launch the 'minesweeper.rb' file in the command line to play!   

[Repo](github.com/DavidMMelin/minesweeper)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
